testcase.name: amazonAllyTest

failure.message: Found 6 accessibility violations: 1) ARIA role must be appropriate for the element: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/aria-allowed-role?application=axeAPI a) ["img[width=\"\\31 00\"]"] Fix any of the following: role presentation is not allowed for given element 2) Text of buttons and links should not be repeated in the image alternative: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/image-redundant-alt?application=axeAPI a) ["a[aria-label=\"Measuring\\ instruments\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text b) ["a[aria-label=\"Medical\\ supplies\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text c) ["a[aria-label=\"Clothing\"]"] existing text as) ["a[aria-label=\"Breakfast\\ cereals\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text at) ["#llJJuLggBbVvPpvL86aXNw > .a-cardui-body > .grid-row-2.a-section > .quadrant-container-1.quadrant-container.a-spacing-none > .image-redirect.aok-block.image-window"] Fix all of the following: Element contains element with alt text that duplicates existing text 3) Form elements should have a visible label: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/label-title-only?application=axeAPI a) ["#searchDropdownBox"] Fix all of the following: Only title used to generate label for form element 4) Links must have discernible text: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/link-name?application=axeAPI a) ["a[href$=\"ref=footer_logo\"]"] Fix all of the following: Element is in tab order and does not have accessible text Fix any of the following: Element does not have text that is visible to screen readers aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation" Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" 5) Page must contain a level-one heading: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/page-has-heading-one?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix all of the following: Page must have a level-one heading 6) All page content must be contained by landmarks: https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/3.1/region?application=axeAPI a) ["html"] Fix any of the following: Some page content is not contained by landmarks expected [true] but found [false]
